price: Ó fẹ́ ko yín kúrò lórí ilẹ̀ yín ni.” (Fir‘aon wí pé: ) “Kí ni ohun tí ẹ máa mú wá ní ìmọ̀ràn?”¹
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
